page.title: 03 Games we Play
page.content:
Off Ground It The object of this game is someone has to be "it" and the other people have to run to somewhere that is off the ground but if you get touched by the person who is "it" you will have to take your turn at catching the others.You can play as long as you like.
Spot Ball Spot ball is a game when one person has a ball and he has to hit the other people in the game with the ball.It is fun for the people who are not throwing the ball to roll and jump while dodging the ball.Everyone except the person with the ball must not stand up.
